summary.para: Custom Editor for the EventTrigger Component.
Extend this class to write a custom editor for an EventTrigger-derived component.
Implement specific EventTrigger inspector GUI code here. If you want to simply extend the existing editor call the base OnInspectorGUI () before doing any custom GUI code.
